awards: BAFTA Awards, Tony Awards, Emmy Awards, Honorary Academy Award  '''Eli Herschel Wallach''' (born December 7, 1915) is an American film, television and stage actor whose career has spanned more than six decades, beginning in the late 1940s. For his performance as Silva Vacarro in ''Baby Doll'', he won a BAFTA Award for Best Newcomer and a Golden Globe nomination. Among his most famous roles are Calvera (character)
